thread.title: Text Request Takes Chattanooga Innovation to New York City Techweek
thread.title_full: Text Request Takes Chattanooga Innovation to New York City Techweek

author: prbuzz.com
title: Text Request Takes Chattanooga Innovation to New York City Techweek
text:
Chattanooga, Tenn. -- One local tech startup is heading to New York City to take on Techweek, the city’s “greatest celebration of innovation and technology.”
“Chattanooga is an incredible place to be an entrepreneur and build a tech company,” says James Dawson, Text Request director of sales and marketing, who’s heading the charge to the Big Apple. “And New York is without a doubt a great place to compete.”
The event will feature a public, multi-round pitch competition and dozens of speakers representing Fortune 500 tech companies to venture capitalists, along with a public expo and individual meetings with investors.
“There’s several things we’re trying to get out of this trip,” Dawson continued. “One is fulfillment. We’re doing well locally and with our niche targets nationally, but winning this competition will bring a certain amount of validation to everything we’ve done so far. Even if we don’t win, the publicity and exposure we’ll get from being involved in this event, in a town like New York City, could prove invaluable.
“We’re also looking forward to the one-on-one time with so many investors. We want to make partnerships, we want to make those connections, and most importantly we want to grow.
“There’s going to be thousands of New York businesses represented at the public expo and pitch sessions. It’ll be great to work with so many businesses we wouldn’t be able to reach by staying in Chatt, and we’re really excited to make a statement in this city!”
James Dawson and Text Request will be in New York City for Techweek between Wednesday, Oct. 14 and Saturday Oct. 17, competing with 49 other startups from across the nation for a chance to win $50,000.
More on Text Request:
Text Request is an intuitive cloud-based platform that lets consumers and businesses engage each other in real-time, two-way personal text conversations. Every business gets a local area-code number, can setup multiple users, and can easily manage conversations for quality and compliance. Consumers then text with you just like a friend.
